mean rate of 1.5 every 15 metres.
	
(a)	 find the probability that in 15 metres of her cloth there are

(3)

she selects 15 rolls at random.

(4)

each piece of her cloth is 4 metres long.
	
the cost to make each piece is £5.00
	
she sells each piece of her cloth that contains no faults for £7.40
	
she sells each piece of her cloth that contains faults for £2.00
	
(c)  find the expected profit that bhavna will make on each piece of her cloth that 
she sells.

(c)	 using a suitable approximation test, at the 5% level of significance, whether or not
